mapper.sql: ID, FAMILY_NUMBER, APPLY_PEOPLE_NUMBER, TRANSACTOR_MOBILE, ID_CARD_IMAGE, ID_TYPE, ID_CARD, DOCUMENT_UPLOAD, CREATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, DESCRIPTION, ENABLED, DEL_FLAG
mapper.insert: insert into t_water_people_change (FAMILY_NUMBER, APPLY_PEOPLE_NUMBER, TRANSACTOR_MOBILE, ID_CARD_IMAGE, ID_TYPE, ID_CARD, DOCUMENT_UPLOAD, CREATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, DESCRIPTION, ENABLED, DEL_FLAG) values (#{familyNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyPeopleNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{transactorMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCardImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{documentUpload,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(),now(), #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},1,0)
mapper.select: select FAMILY_NUMBER,APPLY_PEOPLE_NUMBER,TRANSACTOR_MOBILE,ID_CARD from t_water_people_change where TRANSACTOR_MOBILE = #{transactorMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DEL_FLAG = 0
